title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When selecting a field in the external jar java.io.File using JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE, the search results are not being selected.
EB: The search results for references to the selected field in the external jar java.io.File should be properly selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar).
2. Open the java.io.File class.
3. Search for references to the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Observe that the search results are not being selected as expected.
